data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Saint Mark to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Mark, Dominica
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 342 believers in the state of Saint Mark the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 342 believers in the state of Saint Mark.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 342 believers in Saint Mark to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, help the 342 believers in Saint Mark to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,558 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Saint Mark.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Saint Mark, Dominica so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Mark, Dominica has a population of 1,900.

We estimate Saint Mark has 342 people who might know Jesus, 1,408 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 150 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.
